$schema.description: The JSON schema to reference. This allows your Editor/LSP to give you autocompletion and validate some inputs.

name.description: Optional display name. If not set the filename will get shown in the app.

is.description: If an array tests them with or.

is_not.description: If an array all have to not match.

is.description: Is exactly the provided number. Or one of them if multiple are specified.

greater_than.description: Everything greater than the provided number.

smaller_than.description: Everything smaller than the provided number

in_the_range.description: Is in between the provided range(s), including the end.

anyOf.description: *All* specified rules need to match for a track to be added.
*Any* of the specified rules need to match for a track to be added. If one is passes the track gets added.

items.description: Filter by fields or add nested 'all' and 'any' groups.

rules.description:
Dictates what to put into the smart playlist.
All top level rules need to match for a track to get added.
An "any" group matches if any single rule within it matches. Whereas an "all" rules matches only if all rules match.
